name: Analytics Reports API
description: A Rails application that provides analytics and reporting capabilities for Salsify. It serves as a GraphQL API (part of Salsify's unified supergraph) for managing reports, dashboards, widgets, and report grids. The service handles retailer-specific analytics data, report configurations, and integrates with Content Flow for action flow templates. Runs on port 30000 in development.
